Uses of Interface
oracle.ucp.UniversalConnectionPoolAdapter

Packages that use UniversalConnectionPoolAdapter
oracle.ucp.admin Defines interfaces for administering Universal Connection Pool instances, including JMX support. 
oracle.ucp.jdbc Includes various interfaces and classes used by applications to work with JDBC connections and a connection pool. 

 

Uses of UniversalConnectionPoolAdapter in oracle.ucp.admin

 

Methods in oracle.ucp.admin with parameters of type UniversalConnectionPoolAdapter
 void UniversalConnectionPoolManager.createConnectionPool(UniversalConnectionPoolAdapter ucpAdapter)
          Creates a connection pool instance based on specified UCP Adapter.
 UniversalConnectionPoolMBean UniversalConnectionPoolManagerMBean.createConnectionPool(UniversalConnectionPoolAdapter ucpAdapter)
          Creates a connection pool instance based on specified UCP Adapter.

 

Uses of UniversalConnectionPoolAdapter in oracle.ucp.jdbc

 

Classes in oracle.ucp.jdbc that implement UniversalConnectionPoolAdapter
 class PoolDataSourceImpl
          A connection pool-aware data source.
 class PoolXADataSourceImpl
          A connection pool-aware data source.
